about_the_game:
The Starter Pack includes 1 Super Animal breed, 2 cosmetic items, and a great deal on S.A.W. Tickets:

  • 500 S.A.W. Tickets + 100 Bonus S.A.W. Tickets, for a total of 600 (premium currency used to purchase Super Animal Passes as well as premium cosmetic items from the S.A.W. Shop)
  • Super White Bengal Tiger
  • Roman Armor
  • Gladius

Neither animal breeds nor cosmetic items provide any gameplay advantage.

Availability of the Season 3 Starter Pack ends when Season 3 of Super Animal Royale concludes later in 2022.
detailed_description:
The Starter Pack includes 1 Super Animal breed, 2 cosmetic items, and a great deal on S.A.W. Tickets:

  • 500 S.A.W. Tickets + 100 Bonus S.A.W. Tickets, for a total of 600 (premium currency used to purchase Super Animal Passes as well as premium cosmetic items from the S.A.W. Shop)
  • Super White Bengal Tiger
  • Roman Armor
  • Gladius

Neither animal breeds nor cosmetic items provide any gameplay advantage.

Availability of the Season 3 Starter Pack ends when Season 3 of Super Animal Royale concludes later in 2022.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS X 10.11+
  • Processor: Core i3 and up
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256mb Video Memory, OpenGL 3.2
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 900 MB available space
  • Sound Card: 5
  • Additional Notes: 64 Bit Required

name: Super Animal Royale Season 3 Starter Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Core i3 and up
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256mb Video Memory
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 900 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64 Bit Required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Battle your way into Super Animal Royale with the limited-time Season 3 Starter Pack DLC.
supported_languages:
English*, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
